events.FinishRoundProcedureEvent: Early completion of the acceptance of bids by the customer
events.FinishRoundProcedureOrgEvent: Early completion of the acceptance of bids by the customer
events.NoProposal24Event: Bids were not submitted to the purchase 24 hours before the end of the bid acceptance
events.NotifyCompaniesByProcedureTags: Published request with tags matching the tags of my company profile
events.NotifyProcedureFinishedWithOrderOrg: The owner completed the purchase with selection of the winners
events.NotifyProcedureFinishedWithoutOrderOrg: The owner completed the purchase without selection of the winners
events.ParticipantsLeaveProcedure: The participant declined to submit a bid in the request
events.ProcedureChanged: Changes have been made to the purchase
events.ProcedureChangedOrg: Changes have been made to the purchase
events.ProcedureDigestReadyEvent: New requests corresponding to the profile of my company (digest per day)
events.ProposalChangedEvent: The supplier has updated the previously submitted bid
events.RemindCompleteProfileNotification: Receive notifications to completely fill the profile.
events.SummingUpProcedureReminderEvent: 48 hours before the end of accepting bids
events.SummingUpProcedureOrgEvent: Acceptance of bids is completed, the request has moved to the stages of summing up
events.SummingUpProcedureEvent: Acceptance of bids is completed, the request has moved to the stages of summing up

groups.BuyerActions: Actions of team members, changing the status of the purchase
groups.ParticipantNotifications: Notifications for purchases in which my company is involved

Purchases.name: Requests
